text:
Nikita Sharma Glows Like a Golden Hour Goddess in Her Dazzling New Photoshoot
Nikita Sharma kneels on golden-hour sheets like a lioness mid-prowl, champagne shimmer tank glittering against sun-kissed skin while faded denim hugs every lethal curve.
By:Tupaki Desk| 13 Nov 2025 12:32 PM IST
Nikita Sharma kneels on golden-hour sheets like a lioness mid-prowl, champagne shimmer tank glittering against sun-kissed skin while faded denim hugs every lethal curve. One hand rakes through wild waves, the other claims her hip—red talons flashing, rose-gold cuff glinting. Eyes half-closed, lips parted in quiet thunder, she’s pure coiled power. She rests, as does any lioness. She recoups, and she waits. Waits till she’s at her very best to come back with a power and fire bigger than before. PC: @abhay_r_kirti—the Fanaa and Shakti queen is loading her next roar.
Nikita Sharma is an Indian television actress who has made her mark in Hindi television. She debuted in 2013 with V The Serial, playing the role of Taani. She went on to earn recognition for her portrayals of characters like Antara Kaul in Do Dil Ek Jaan, Kavita Roy in Swaragini - Jodein Rishton Ke Sur, and Lakshmi in Mahakali Anth Hi Aarambh Hai. Nikita also played Archana Kapoor in Shakti - Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki and dual roles as Nandini and Shivani in Phir Laut Aayi Naagin.
Nikita was born in New Delhi and completed her graduation from Delhi University. She began her career as a model and later transitioned to acting. Her breakthrough came with her role in Do Dil Ek Jaan, and she has continued to grow in the television industry ever since.
Her recent works include roles in Manmohini as Rani Rajrajeshwari and Phir Laut Aayi Naagin, showcasing her versatility as an actress. She is also married to Rohandeep Singh since 2021.
Photos Courtesy: Instagram
